snippet: Tennis great Roger Federer has issued a tacit apology for inadvertently provoking a war of words with temperamental local Bernard Tomic ahead of the Australian Open....
lead_paragraph: Tennis great Roger Federer has issued a tacit apology for inadvertently provoking a war of words with temperamental local Bernard Tomic ahead of the Australian Open.

headline.print_headline: Federer Smooths Over Rift With Tomic
headline.main: Federer Smooths Over Rift With Tomic
